lines.text: I am afraid I'm fully invested in ammunitions factories.
All this peace breaking out in the world I think we might very well be ruined.
How sad, mon amour! It seems that no one wants to blow anything up anymore.
Yes, well, they all won't be coming to see me, my sweet. I mean, we do have Cousin Tit and of course, you know, she's been turning heads for quite a while now.
She has filled out lately, hasn't she?
Yes, and then, of course, there's my 18-year-old niece, Tuesday. Well, she's coming on Wednesday.
And put her to work on Thursday. She'd be glad to pitch in.
